examples.example: 便捷的运输系统让货物可以快速到达全国各地。

translate.english: The convenient transportation system enables goods to reach all parts of the country quickly.

examples.example: 现代化的运输方式大大提高了人们生活的便利性。

translate.english: Modern means of transportation have greatly improved the convenience of people's lives.

examples.example: 运输行业的不断发展，为经济增长做出了重要贡献。

translate.english: The continuous development of the transportation industry has made important contributions to economic growth.
